channel.title: Changing the donator icon [PI]
channel.description: Well I want to change my donator icon into a different icon. I know how to make the icon, but I dont know where the chat takes place. I need the assistants to have the icon by there name in yell and chat. What file do I add the img part because I searched everywhere and its not there.
